snippet.title: Copter - ZX Spectrum
snippet.description: This is a helicopter shooter game where the only real aim is to rescue the people at the bottom the screen to the top, shooting the other copters and planes is all just a bonus and it's actually very difficult to do as your copter moves so fast. This is the reason I rarely shoot in this video, I wanted to focus on rescing people and only shoot when I needed to.
